templates.content: I'm afriad passes cannot be shared and are non-transferable.
templates.name: Season Pass: Can I share my pass with someone else?

templates.content: I'm afraid passes are non-transferable and non-refundable.
templates.name: Season Pass: Can I get a refund for unused tickets?

templates.content:
Standing Room Only provides access to Fiserv Forum without an exact seat location. There are specific areas around the arena where SRO ticket holders can stand. Current Standing Room Only areas are behind the following sections:

â€¢ Main Concourse: 108, 116, 117, and 120
â€¢ Upper Concourse: 201, 205, 211, 222-223, and 227-228
â€¢ Non-ticket areas in the Potawatomi Club

Please note that Standing Room Only areas are subject to change on a game-to-game basis.
templates.name: Season Pass: What is a Standing Room Only ticket?

templates.content:
You will need a smartphone with a web browser to access and display your digital tickets for admission to Fiserv Forum.

Easy Ticketing: Confirm your attendance via email on game day, and receive your digital ticket a few hours before tip-off!
templates.name: Season Pass: What do I need to access my digital tickets for the game?

templates.content:
It will vary based on which package you purchased. For Bucks Super Pass, you are guaranteed a Standing Room Only ticket and access into Fiserv Forum. Based on gameday availability, you could receive seated tickets. 

For Bucks Super Pass - Guaranteed Upper Level Seat, you are guaranteed a seated ticket in the upper level. For Bucks Super Pass - Guaranteed Lower Level Seat: you are guaranteed a seated ticket in the lower level.
templates.name: Seasonal Pass: Where can I expect to sit each game?

templates.content: I'm afriad passes are non-transferable.
templates.name: Season Pass: Can I sell my pass for games that I do not attend?

templates.content: You can buy up to four passes per account.
templates.name: Season Pass: How many passes can I buy?

templates.content: You will receive an email the day of each game to redeem your tickets. The email will be sent to the email used to purchase the Pass roughly 4 hours before tip.
templates.name: Season Pass: How do I claim my ticket(s)?

templates.content: Our processing time takes 3-5 business days and we ship via USPS. Once shipped it will take 1-3 business days for domestic orders. Please note that some items from Highland Mint, Phenom Gallery, iSlide and Mojo ship directly from the vendor and may take 7-14 days to arrive. Please allow 1-2 weeks for production and shipping of Customized Game Jerseys.
